original: 揚州廬江人。原為袁術部下，於赤壁之戰後投靠已擁荊南四郡的劉備，但不久即被夏侯淵討伐並斬殺。一說雷緒與雷薄乃同一人。
text: People from Lujiang, Yangzhou. Originally a subordinate of Yuan Shu, he took refuge in Liu Bei who had owned the four counties of Jingnan after the Battle of Chibi, but was crusade and beheaded by Xia Houyuan soon after. One said that Lei Xu and Lei Bo are the same person.
